content.text:
# KML Most Valuable Player Award

The KML Most Valuable Player Award () is an award for the top-tier professional basketball league in Estonia, the Korvpalli Meistriliiga (KML).
Winners
MVP
{| class="wikitable"
|-
!Season !! Player !! Team
|-

|-

|-

|-
|align="center"|1999–00

|-
|align="center"|2000–01

|-

|-

|-
|align="center"|2005–06
